name: Amazing Online
storyline: The player is a simple man who lost his memory and woke up at the railway station of Batyrevo, where he is met by Fedor Naumov, Anzhela Kovaleva and Maxim Snegirev, who guide him through the story and teach him how to play
summary: Massive online role-playing game in the open world on the map of the alternative Nizhny Novgorod region of Russia, where up to a thousand players on one map can complete interesting quests, play the role of their character, participate in events, create their own criminal group or family, work as a truck driver, farmer, fisherman or join a state organization - edit news in the media, protect order in the police, legislate in the Administration, treat other players in the hospital, help in an ambulance, protect a military unit and perform administrative functions in the army, counteract corruption in the FSB (or become a corrupt official yourself - everything is possible here) or follow the correction of the guilty in the Federal Penitentiary Service, or simply create your own business and lead a peaceful life in wealth and luxury.
